mapper.select: select a.*, a.personal_id as personalId, a.personal_name as personalName, a.department_name as departmentName, a.position_name as positionName, a.reason as reason, a.leave_time as leaveTime, a.expiration_date as expirationDate, a.status as status from personal_leave a left join personal p on a.personal_id = p.id left join department d on a.department_name = d.department_name left join position ps on a.position_name = ps.position_name

select a.*, a.personal_id as personalId, a.personal_name as personalName, a.department_name as departmentName, a.position_name as positionName, a.reason as reason, a.leave_time as leaveTime, a.expiration_date as expirationDate, a.status as status from personal_leave a left join personal p on a.personal_id = p.id left join department d on a.department_name = d.department_name left join position ps on a.position_name = ps.position_name where a.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into personal_leave(personal_id, personal_name, department_name, position_name,reason,leave_time,expiration_date,status) values(#{personalId}, #{personalName}, #{departmentName}, #{positionName}, #{reason}, #{leaveTime}, #{expirationDate}, #{status})
